body_html: Thanks, all. I will close this PR. I think TF using CPU to do image preprocessing is limited by slow python runtime, and using an independent C-based preprocessor instead of TF runtime preprocessing solves my problem, not only faster but also less CPU occupation.
body_text: Thanks, all. I will close this PR. I think TF using CPU to do image preprocessing is limited by slow python runtime, and using an independent C-based preprocessor instead of TF runtime preprocessing solves my problem, not only faster but also less CPU occupation.
body: Thanks, all. I will close this PR. I think TF using CPU to do image preprocessing is limited by slow python runtime, and using an independent C-based preprocessor instead of TF runtime preprocessing solves my problem, not only faster but also less CPU occupation.
